thread.title: Windows 10 Build 10547 Includes Diverse Emoji
thread.title_full: Windows 10 Build 10547 Includes New Diverse Emoji - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Windows 10 Build 10547 Includes Diverse Emoji
text: Microsoft has tried to improve Windows 10 in every possible way, so the change log of the new operating system includes pretty much everything from new apps and desktop features to more customization colors and fresh emoji. And as far as the emojis are concerned, Microsoft tried to bring Windows 10 in line with the other software solutions or services out there that are currently using them. As a result, the new operating system now comes with a larger collection of emoj... Â»
